skilllist.skilldesc:
<font color="a6aafb">Hold</font>: Kimmy continuously shoots Chemical Bolts in the target direction, each bolt consuming 120% energy and dealing 1 <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the enemy hit. Chemical Bolts that fail to hit an enemy will explode at the end of their paths, dealing the same amount of damage to nearby enemies.
The Chemical Bolts can Crit.

Kimmy shoots out enhanced Chemical Spray and recoils in the opposite direction. Enemies that come into contact with the Spray left on the path will take 120 <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> every 300<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+60% Total Magic Power)</font>s and be slowed by  for s.
Kimmy also restores  energy upon casting this skill.

After a period of charging, Kimmy launches a Luminous Chemical Attack in a designated direction. The projectile will explode upon hitting an enemy or reaching the maximum range, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+45% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+54% Total Magic Power)</font>-75% <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the primary target (scales with charging time) and 1 damage to nearby enemies.

data.name: Kimmy

__data.skilldesc: Remove all debuffs (excluding Suppression) and gain <font color="62f8fe">Control Immunity</font> and 15% Movement Speed for 1.2s.

__data.skilldescemblem: Remove all debuffs (excluding Suppression) and gain <font color="62f8fe">Control Immunity</font> and 15% Movement Speed for 1.2s.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Basic Attacks slow enemies by 50% and reduce their Attack Speed by 30%.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 1s</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 10s (each Basic Attack reduces it by 1s, down to 3s)</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Recharge: Increases Magic Power by 5 after dealing Magic Damage (this effect stacks up to 6 times and can only gain 1 stack every 0.4s). When reaching full stacks, increases Magic Damage by 12% for 5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Recharge: Increases Magic Power by 5 after dealing Magic Damage (this effect stacks up to 6 times and can only gain 1 stack every 0.4s). When reaching full stacks, increases Magic Damage by 12% for 5s.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

recommendmasterplan.name: 疑犯_Yifan
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: Born into a military family, she earned recognition through her own merit as the bold yet laid-back "tough girl" of the Border Guard.

assist.desc: Kimmy excels at controlling and grouping enemies while dealing substantial damage, so she works well with heroes who have AOE CC like Badang and Ruby.

strong.desc: Kimmy's ability to Basic Attack while moving makes her effective against heroes who rely on skillshots like Granger and Cecilion.

weak.desc: As a Marksman who cannot lock onto targets with Basic Attacks, Kimmy can be countered by heroes with high burst damage and mobility, such as Saber and Lancelot.
